abstract: Coty included a new backer, Berkshire Hathaway, in its higher $10.7 billion bid for Avon Products, an unfriendly takeover that in some ways runs counter to Warren Buffett’s preferred methods of deal-making.
snippet: Coty included a new backer, Berkshire Hathaway, in its higher $10.7 billion bid for Avon Products, an unfriendly takeover that in some ways runs counter to Warren Buffett’s preferred methods of deal-making.
lead_paragraph: Coty on Thursday raised its takeover bid for Avon Products to $10.7 billion and unveiled a potent new weapon: Warren E. Buffett.

headline.main: In Backing Coty’s Bid for Avon, Buffett Takes Unusual Step

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
